name: HSC_CYTOLOGY_SPEC_INSTR
description: The HSC_CYTOLOGY_SPEC_INSTR table contains special instruction information for cytology specimens.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CYTOLOGY_SPEC_INSTR_C_NAME
columns.description: The category values of cytology special instructions for a specimen record.
